attributes.action: Force social media to stop blocking any future content from users
attributes.additional_details:
21/3/2019 facebook blocked a picture detailing the date of a road block set to demonstrate a peaceful protest against the delay of brexit
This poster detailed the date and time for people to join the protest. 
Not only is our domocracy being tarnished but our right for free movment to protest is being blocked
The less people attend these protests the easier it is to controll the public. It is our right to protest what ever we want. 
No content should be blocked
Children shouldnt be on facebook
attributes.background:
Facebook and other social media has been blocking content. 
They do this to controll the filtered news feed 
We the British public do not want our news filtered

rejection.details: We aren't sure what rules you would like to apply to social media companies. In particular we aren't sure if you want social media companies to be unable to block illegal or harmful content.
